Name: Dungeons of Betrayal
About the game: In this thrilling dungeon crawler RPG, regain your lost memories by navigating your way through various mazes and puzzles.  The characters you meet and choices you make will determine how far you go so think quickly to how you want to proceed.   It is your quest to figure out if they are friends or foes. But be careful anyone can betray you in the Dungeons of Betrayal . What makes the game unique and fun to play: - Dark, humorous and ever-changing story-line - High replay value. - Discover secret areas - Simple stat distribution system - Easy weapon upgrade feature - Unique sparing system
